String.string: Secrets Not Meant to Be Known
"The ancient giants have fallen asleep again. How disappointing."
You've been recalled to Velika. Report to Commander Seir at the Valkyon Federation Headquarters. [Press to open your inventory and confirm the return order.]
Speak with Elleon at the Valkyon Federation Headquarters.
Take a pegasus to Tulufan and speak with Elsine.
Go to Kardelen at Camp Marrakeen in Colossal Ruins. [Use the {@LinkCreature:66#1015#Teleportal} in Tulufan.]
"Can't let you near the arena! You devil's servants!"
"You are too slow to claim the power of Surtr!"
"You will never find Worlkir! Or his secrets!"
Go to the Colossal Ruins and eliminate Desert Fire tribe destroyers, ragers, and prophets of Mags Kurata and Mags Kuchanaru.
Speak with Dinian and ask what the Desert Fire meant.
Speak with {@linkcreature:218#1009#Chenast} at Colossal Ruins and ask where the scion leader is.
High Priestess Akia is giving out orders.
Eliminate {@linkcreature:18#107#Adarak} and {@linkcreature:18#108#Jerexis} north of the Plaza of the Mighty and obtain their orders.
Go to {@linkcreature:18#1035#Majuel} and show the scion orders.
Go to Nema east of the Temple of Tithus.
Go to the {@linkcreature:218#1501#teleportal} in the center of the temple.
Use the {@linkcreature:218#1501#teleportal} to enter the Vault of Glory. Eliminate all Scions of Lok and destroy the anguish shard.
Report to Mirak at Sietch Bidaum in the Colossal Ruins.
Use Mirak's teleportal scroll and go to Tulufan. [Press to open your inventory and use the Tulufan Teleport Scroll.]
Tell Elsine what the scions are up to.
